original_text: Then were the king's scribes called at that time in the third month, that is, the month Sivan, on the three and twentieth day thereof; and it was written according to all that Mordecai commanded unto the Jews, and to the lieutenants, and the deputies and rulers of the provinces which are from India unto Ethiopia, an hundred twenty and seven provinces, unto every province according to the writing thereof, and unto every people after their language, and to the Jews according to their writing, and according to their language.
korean_text: 그 때 시완월 곧 삼월 이십삼일에 왕의 서기관이 소집되고 모르드개가 시키는 대로 조서를 써서 인도로부터 구스까지의 백이십칠 지방 유다인과 대신과 지방관과 관원에게 전할새 각 지방의 문자와 각 민족의 언어와 유다인의 문자와 언어로 쓰되

sentences.original_text: Then were the king's scribes called at that time
on the three and twentieth day thereof
and it was written according to all that Mordecai commanded
and the deputies and rulers of the provinces
which are from India unto Ethiopia
an hundred twenty and seven provinces
unto every province according to the writing thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 각 지방의 글에 따라 각 지방에

sentences.original_text: and unto every people after their language
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 민족의 언어에 따라 각 민족에게

sentences.original_text: and to the Jews according to their writing
